title: Wetzel: Lane Kiffin's decision is coming Saturday. He better win Friday
content: As the drama at Ole Miss drags on, there's a game to play Friday. And the pressure on Kiffin to win will be overwhelming.

title: Sources: Oregon State to hire Shephard as coach
content: Oregon State has agreed to terms on a five-year deal to make Alabama co-offensive coordinator JaMarcus Shephard the school's next head coach, per ESPN sources.

title: Sources: Vanderbilt's Lea lands 6-year extension
content: Amid interest from other schools, coach Clark Lea has signed an extension to stay at Vanderbilt. The extension is for six years, sources told ESPN's Pete Thamel.

title: Mahomes: Chiefs 'got to win every game now'
content: After the Chiefs' loss to the Cowboys, QB Patrick Mahomes summed up the team's bleak playoff chances. "You've got to win every game now -- and hope that's enough," he said.

title: Lamar cites consistency amid turnovers, slump
content: Ravens QB Lamar Jackson insisted after Thursday's loss to the Bengals there is one solution to get out of his career-worst slump: consistency.

title: 'Proud to be back': QB Burrow has 2 TDs in win
content: After missing more than two months with a turf toe injury that required surgery, Bengals QB Joe Burrow threw two touchdowns in a 32-14 win at the Ravens.

title: Campbell: Lions in 'little bit of a hole' after loss
content: Even coach Dan Campbell could admit after the Lions' 31-24 Thanksgiving Day loss to the Packers, that "we've dug ourselves a little bit of a hole" at 7-5 overall.

title: üéµ Which NFL players are best locker room DJs?
content: The key to a good DJ is understanding the room's vibe and being versatile -- and not always playing NBA YoungBoy.

title: 37 games with postseason implications to fill your Rivalry Week menu
content: As if the intensity of rival games weren't enough, there are high stakes everywhere you look this weekend.

title: Week 14 preview: Rivalry Week stakes, plus conference championship scenarios
content: Ahead of Rivalry Week, our college football experts get into the stakes in the biggest matchups of Week 14.

title: WWE Survivor Series: Key stats and info to know before WarGames
content: As we approach Saturday's WWE premium live event, let's catch up on some notes and stats for each match.

title: Preview: Can the teams coexist?
content: Breaking down the biggest storylines at Survivor Series: WarGames, including John Cena's final PLE match.

title: Our guide to remaining Week 13 NFL games: Matchup previews, predictions, picks and nuggets
content: The Browns and Shedeur Sanders hosting the Niners? Sam Darnold playing his old Vikings team? We have picks, predictions and stats for every Week 13 game.

title: Week 13 buzz: What we're hearing on the struggling Bucs, Pickens' next deal, more
content: Are the Bucs worried about their losing streak? Will the Cowboys extend George Pickens? Here's the latest intel.

title: Questions, takeaways from Thanksgiving matchups: Our reporters break down every game
content: Our NFL Nation reporters answer big questions from each Week 13 game, starting with Thanksgiving Day matchups.

title: Women's Feast Week guide: Texas wins inaugural Players Era on Harmon's game winner
content: With Players Era wins over UCLA and South Carolina, Texas established itself as the No. 2 team in the country.

title: 'Not just waiting around for Paul and Joel': NBA scouts, execs on what's next in Philly
content: What is the 76ers' ceiling? How good is the Maxey-Edgecombe duo? We talked to league insiders about the new era in Philly.

title: How Tyrese Maxey went from the hardwood to the 2025 National Dog Show
content: Maxey recently ran two dogs through the Purina Pro Plan Incredible Dog Challenge Agility Show in Philadelphia.

title: Bears CB C.J. Gardner-Johnson learned valuable lesson during volatile year: 'It's really on me'
content: Gardner-Johnson is on his fourth team in the 2025 calendar year, and he's hoping to make the most of his Bears stint.

title: Standouts, key takeaways from the CHL-USHL Prospect Challenge
content: The top players met for a showcase this week ahead of the 2026 NHL draft. Who (and what) stood out most?

title: Repeating as Premier League champions is hard -- as Liverpool are finding out
content: Liverpool's collapse is part of a common trend of Premier League champions struggling to keep up their form the next season. Why is that?

title: Are Chelsea really title contenders? Arsenal clash will give us an answer
content: The question was barely being asked a month ago, but by Sunday evening the answer might be a big "Yes."

title: Chaos for Barcelona and Liverpool, Arsenal No. 1: Reranking the Champions League
content: With just three games left, Arsenal look like the best team in the competition, while Barcelona, Liverpool and Man City are spiraling. Let's review how the UEFA Champions League looks after Matchday 5.

title: Talking points: Pep's tinkering costs City, Arsenal look unstoppable
content: Statement wins, coaches under pressure and bizarre team selections. ESPN writers break down Matchday 5.

title: WNBA CBA negotiations: What happens if there's no deal at the end of the 30 days?
content: How far apart are the two sides and what if a deal isn't in place by the Sunday WNBA deadline for a new CBA?

title: MLB offseason survey: 16 execs predict free agency, blockbuster trades and more
content: We surveyed the sport on the biggest free agents and top trade candidates as baseball's hot stove heats up.

title: Black Friday betting: Big games coming for Hurts, Barkley vs. streaking Bears?
content: Odds, game bets, prop plays and analysis to help you bet the Chicago Bears-Philadelphia Eagles Black Friday matchup.

title: Browns players are rallying around Shedeur Sanders' big plays and big personality
content: Teammates are citing the high energy from the rookie QB's first win as "something that we could feed off of."

title: NLL 2025-26 team-by-team season preview
content: The Buffalo Bandits begin their quest for a four-peat. Who is their top competition? Here's intel on all 14 teams.

title: Is it time for McLaren to prioritize Norris over Piastri?
content: McLaren has refused to favor one driver over the other all season, but as Max Verstappen closes in, should the Papaya outfit issue team orders?

title: 23XI vs. NASCAR trial: Why Michael Jordan & Co. want to tear up stock car racing
content: The antitrust suit against NASCAR goes to court on Monday, in a trial that could tear at the fabric of stock car racing as we know it.

title: USMNT 2026 World Cup Big Board 3.0: Reyna, Scally back in the fold
content: We're closing in on the new year, and with months until the World Cup begins, which U.S. players are best positioned to make next year's squad?

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man City to rival Arsenal for rising Spain star Mendoza
content: Arsenal might have to compete with Manchester City to sign Elche midfielder Rodrigo Mendoza. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Fantasy fast break: Eric Moody on Mikal Bridges' durability, Kel'el Ware's rise and more
content: Eric Moody's fantasy basketball insights you need to know about, including Mikal Bridges' durability and production in New York, Kel'el Ware's second-year rise and more.

title: The White House, for sale: Inside Trump‚Äôs Black Friday presidency
content: President Trump's second term has transformed US governance into a marketplace for influence, where policy and personal enrichment are intertwined.  From foreign gifts to crypto ventures, access to power now dictates economic success.  This 'Black Friday presidency' sees reduced enforcement and new pay-to-play schemes, making Washington a transactional hub.

title: India gets 'major power' status: Op Sindoor boosts military ranking - report
content: India has achieved 'major power' status, ranking third in Asia according to the Lowy Institute's Power Index. This rise is attributed to its growing economic and military strengths, notably boosted by recent combat experience in Operation Sindoor. While India leads Japan and Russia, a significant gap remains with China and the US, the top two superpowers.

title: Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma set for 2027 World Cup? Morkel turns heads
content: The three-match ODI series against South Africa begins on Sunday in Ranchi, with the remaining fixtures scheduled in Raipur on Wednesday and Visakhapatnam on Saturday. Rohit enters the series in solid touch, having scored a century and a fifty in the recent ODI series against Australia, including his 33rd ODI ton in Sydney. Kohli, after recording back-to-back ducks in the first two ODIs of that series, bounced back with an unbeaten 74 in the final match.

title: ChatGPT's blind spot: AI chatbot cannot tell you time; here's the reason
content: While advanced AI like ChatGPT and Claude struggle to provide real-time information, including the current time, other chatbots like Gemini and Copilot can. Experts explain this limitation stems from AI models operating within their language space and the challenges of integrating real-time data without overwhelming their context windows. OpenAI is working to improve this capability.

title: K'taka CM tussle: Cong veteran Moily breathes fire; blames top brass of being blind
content: Veteran Congress leader M Veerappa Moily has criticized the party's high command for the ongoing leadership crisis in Karnataka. He emphasized the need for discipline within the party, stating that leadership representatives should have anticipated the current political turmoil. Moily refrained from commenting on specific leadership changes, focusing instead on the immediate requirement for party discipline.

title: Booster shot! India's GDP grows at 8.2% in Q2; beats expectations - top highlights
content: India's economy surged past expectations, posting an impressive 8.2% real GDP growth in the second quarter of FY 2025-26, the highest in six quarters. This robust performance solidifies India's position as the world's fastest-growing major economy, driven by strong secondary and tertiary sector contributions. Private consumption also showed a healthy uptick.

title: ‚ÄòReflects pro-growth policies‚Äô: PM Modi lauds 8.2% GDP data; vows to advance reforms
content: India's economy surged by 8.2% in the July-September quarter, marking a six-quarter high. Prime Minister Modi attributed this robust growth to the "hard work and enterprise" of Indians and the government's pro-growth policies. Finance Minister Sitharaman highlighted sustained economic momentum driven by reforms and fiscal consolidation, reinforcing India's position as the world's fastest-growing major economy.

title: Mark Carney tells Canadians - US tariffs will wipe $50 billion from Canada's economy
content: Canada's Prime Minister Mark Carney is rolling back climate rules and encouraging pipeline construction to boost the energy sector amidst US tariff uncertainty. This move aims to diversify oil exports and reduce reliance on the US market, though it sparks internal government tensions and environmentalist criticism.

title: Trump threatens to halt migration for good: Which countries count as ‚ÄòThird World‚Äô?
content: In a bold move, US President Donald Trump announced his intention to completely stop immigration from 'developing nations,' highlighting issues of national security and ineffective policies. His agenda includes cracking down on illegal entries, expelling potential threats, and restricting benefits for non-citizens.

title: The growing divide: Why employees are losing connection with employers in 2026
content: Glassdoor‚Äôs Worklife Trends 2026 reveals a workplace strained by declining trust, shifting power dynamics, and AI-driven upheaval. Leadership ratings have fallen sharply as workers report rising misalignment, poor communication, and eroding opportunities‚Äîespecially for remote staff. With key industries facing heightened instability, the report warns that rebuilding trust between leaders and employees will define workplace stability in 2026.

title: Apple iPhone 17 available for Rs 45,900 in Croma Black Friday Sale: Know how to grab the deal
content: Croma's Black Friday Sale offers the iPhone 17 at an effective Rs 45,900, a significant reduction from its Rs 82,900 launch price. This deal, valid until November 30, 2025, combines bank cashback, substantial exchange value, and a fixed bonus.  It makes Apple's latest non-Pro model more accessible, featuring a 120Hz ProMotion display and the A19 chip.

title: Sunil Grover's spot-on mimicry of Kapil Dev leaves Virat Kohli in splits of laughter
content: Comedian Sunil Grover recently entertained cricketer Virat Kohli. Grover impersonated legendary cricketer Kapil Dev. His mimicry left Kohli in splits of laughter. Videos of the event are circulating online. Grover joked about Kohli's beard in his Kapil Dev act. The host asked Grover to go easy as Kohli has upcoming matches.

title: US-India trade pact by year-end? Top trade official shares update; adds caution
content: India aims to finalize the initial phase of its Bilateral Trade Agreement with the US by year-end, with commerce secretary Rajesh Agarwal expressing optimism despite global trade shifts. Negotiations have advanced significantly, though last-minute hurdles remain a possibility. Discussions are also progressing on an immediate Framework Trade Deal to address US tariffs on Indian goods.

title: When will Shubman Gill and Shreyas Iyer return? Morkel drops massive update
content: India's bowling coach Morne Morkel provided positive updates on Shubman Gill and Shreyas Iyer's recoveries, though both will miss the upcoming ODI series against South Africa. Gill is recovering well from a neck injury, while Iyer has begun his rehabilitation for an abdominal issue.

title: MLB rumors: Mets could target $15M Padres starter after Dylan Cease deal
content: The New York Mets are reportedly eyeing San Diego Padres pitcher Michael King as their next major acquisition following Dylan Cease's record-breaking contract. King, who excelled as a starter before a mid-season injury, now represents a high-upside option for the Mets amidst a shifting pitching market.  His potential return to peak form makes him an intriguing target.

title: Nick Fuentes seeks proof after Candace Owens links deaths to alleged plot
content: Candace Owens' explosive claims on X, alleging French President Macron and his wife paid for her assassination and French Legion soldiers killed Charlie Kirk, have been met with skepticism. Right-wing commentator Nick Fuentes publicly demanded proof, calling her stories 'crazy' and lacking evidence, particularly mocking her claims about Brigitte Macron's family history and gender.

title: 'Shaadi ke liye ready hoon bas ladki chaiye': Chahal's post goes viral
content: Indian cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal has sparked conversation with an Instagram post indicating he's ready for marriage again, months after his divorce from Dhanashree Verma.  The leg-spinner, who previously revealed intense emotional struggles and suicidal thoughts post-separation, expressed his desire for a partner. His announcement has drawn mixed reactions from fans.

title: Mt Semeru to Hayli Gubbi: Is the world seeing more volcanic eruptions? Explained
content: Recent major volcanic eruptions in Indonesia and Ethiopia have sparked questions about increasing activity. However, experts state there's no evidence of a global rise, attributing perceived increases to better monitoring and reporting. Historical data shows fluctuations, with periods of conflict disrupting documentation. Around 1,350 potentially active volcanoes exist globally, many along the Pacific's Ring of Fire.

title: Why Sir Ken Robinson said schools ‚Äòeducate people out of their creative capacities‚Äô
content: Sir Ken Robinson‚Äôs iconic TED warning about schools and creativity still reads like a diagnosis of today‚Äôs classrooms. From fear of being wrong to the quiet exile of the arts, students are trained to trade imagination for safety, compliance and marks. His charge that schools ‚Äúeducate people out of their creative capacities‚Äù now feels less provocation than stark lived description.

title: Watch: PM Modi unveils 77-ft statue of Lord Ram; launches Ramayana Theme Park
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi unveiled a 77-foot bronze statue of Lord Ram in Goa during the 550th-year celebrations of Shree Samsthan Gokarn Partagali Jeevottam Math. Earlier, he visited Udupi, Karnataka, offering prayers at Sri Krishna Matha and participating in a mass recitation of the Srimad Bhagavad Gita.

title: Harvard-trained doctor lists warning signs of fatty liver that one should never miss
content: Fatty liver can creep up on you without any overt symptoms, but your body may be sending out warning signs. According to Dr. Saurabh Sethi, unexpected weight gain around the belly, increased blood sugar levels, darker urine, ongoing fatigue, and discomfort in the upper abdomen are all red flags.

title: 'Ye toh hamara dost hai': Rohit Sharma's banter with security goes viral - WATCH
content: Rohit Sharma displayed his friendly nature at Ranchi airport, playfully vouching for his cricketer friend Shahbaz Nadeem to security personnel. The heartwarming moment, captured on video, showed Rohit putting his arm around Nadeem as they walked, a gesture appreciated by fans. Sharma is in Ranchi for the upcoming ODI series against South Africa.

title: Major Mohit Sharma‚Äôs family takes legal action against Ranveer Singh‚Äôs ‚ÄòDhurandhar‚Äô
content: Major Mohit Sharma's parents have sued filmmakers of Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar', alleging unauthorized exploitation of their martyred son's life. They claim the film, presented as inspired by true events, falsely links the protagonist to Major Sharma's covert operations. The family seeks to halt the December 5 release, citing privacy and national security concerns.

title: Exclusive | 'Not a surprise': Dutch No. 1 Giri on Divya-Sindarov WC wins
content: Uzbekistan's Javokhir Sindarov, at 19, became the youngest FIDE World Cup champion, mirroring India's Divya Deshmukh, also 19, who achieved the same feat in the Women's World Cup. While both were lower seeds, Dutch Grandmaster Anish Giri suggests their wins are coincidental, attributing them to the unpredictable nature of short match formats rather than a hidden trend among top players.

title: No title in 2025: 'Can't jump to the next peak' ‚Äî Abhinav Bindra on Gukesh's form slump
content: Olympic champion Abhinav Bindra offers perspective on D Gukesh's recent chess performance dip, calling it a natural phase post-major success. Bindra emphasizes returning to basics and recharging energy, both physically and mentally, to overcome such periods. He notes that in sports, past achievements fade, and continuous effort and finding joy are key to navigating these cycles.

title: MLB rumors: Red Sox eye Alex Bregman as No.1 free-agent target
content: Following their playoff exit, the Boston Red Sox are aggressively pursuing top offensive talent for the 2026 season. Alex Bregman, who previously played for Boston, is their primary target. If negotiations falter, the team is also eyeing Pete Alonso, Kyle Schwarber, Kazuma Okamoto, and J.T. Realmuto to bolster their lineup.

title: Shubhangi Atre wraps up her journey on Bhabiji Ghar Par Hain; shares emotional moments
content: Shubhangi Atre has bid adieu to her decade-long role as Angoori Bhabhi in 'Bhabiji Ghar Par Hain', sharing an emotional farewell with her cast and crew. Expressing gratitude for the show that gave her 'everything', Atre is now set to explore new artistic avenues. Shilpa Shinde will reprise the iconic character, marking a new chapter for the popular sitcom.

title: Delhi car blast: Al-Falah chancellor forged papers to grab land of deceased Hindu owners
content: Enforcement Directorate has alleged that Al-Falah University chancellor Javed Ahmed Siddiqui fraudulently obtained Delhi land by forging documents of deceased Hindu landowners. The agency claims a fake General Power of Attorney, dated 2004, was used to transfer property in Madanpur Khadar to a trust linked to Siddiqui.  The investigation into this alleged land scam is ongoing with Siddiqui in ED custody.

title: Have any tiring activities coming up? Learn how 'sleep banking' can make you more focused
content: Sleep banking means getting extra sleep ahead of time to build up a reserve against upcoming sleep loss. This practice helps reduce the drop in alertness, focus, and performance when sleep gets short later. Studies show it works best for planned tough periods like long shifts, wedding, travel, or night duties, not as a fix for ongoing poor sleep

title: 'Bhai hai woh mera': Nitish Rana provides major update on Shubman Gill's health - WATCH
content: Indian cricket captain Shubman Gill has been ruled out of the Test and ODI series against South Africa due to a neck injury sustained during the first Test.  Indian cricketer Nitish Rana, who is currently playing in Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy, provided an update on Gill's condition when asked by a fan.

title: Hong Kong tragedy: Fire alarms of affected buildings failed; toll rises to 128
content: The death toll from a devastating blaze at Hong Kong's Wang Fuk Court residential complex has climbed to 128, with fire alarms reportedly malfunctioning. Investigations into the cause are ongoing, focusing on renovation materials, and three men have been arrested on suspicion of manslaughter and gross negligence.

title: 'Getting involved in criminal activities': UAE halts visas for most Pakistanis
content: UAE has significantly curtailed visa issuance for Pakistanis, narrowly avoiding a complete passport ban. This move, reportedly due to concerns over criminal activities by visitors, has caused considerable difficulty for Pakistani nationals seeking entry. Meanwhile, UAE officials highlight visa facilitation reforms, processing hundreds of visas daily at a new center.

title: CCTV captures deadly gang war in Rajasthan; cars ram motorcycle, attempt to run over people
content: A violent gang clash erupted in Bansur, Rajasthan, with rival groups engaging in a dangerous confrontation. CCTV footage shows unidentified men ramming a motorcycle and attempting to run over opponents on Harsaura Road. Police are investigating and searching for suspects, assuring strict action.

title: VIP crash: Stage crashes as BJP netas crowd around bride and groom at UP wedding
content: A wedding stage at a ceremony in Ballia district, Uttar Pradesh, collapsed late Wednesday evening while VIP guests were blessing the newlyweds. The structure, reportedly lacking proper support, gave way as around 12-14 guests and the bride and groom stood on it for photographs. Fortunately, no injuries were reported in the incident.

title: 'Will PM Modi take up South Africa‚Äôs cause?' Cong jibes after Trump bars Pretoria from G20
content: Congress leader Jairam Ramesh questioned Prime Minister Modi's stance on South Africa's exclusion from the next G20 Summit by Donald Trump. Ramesh urged Modi, a self-proclaimed champion of Africa and the Global South, to advocate for South Africa's rightful participation, highlighting the nation's economic significance and strong ties with India.

title: India's new quake map: Himalayan arc in highest danger zone; major shift in decades
content: India has released a new earthquake map. The entire Himalayan region is now in the highest risk zone. Over 60% of India faces moderate to high earthquake hazards. New building codes will ensure greater safety. Infrastructure projects must meet stricter standards. This update reflects a scientific approach to seismic assessment.

title: Trump touts golf achievements after announcing National Guard member Sarah Beckstrom‚Äôs death
content: President Donald Trump announced the death of National Guard member Sarah Beckstrom. Hours later, he celebrated a golf championship win. This contrast sparked debate about his claims of golfing skill. Author Rick Reilly's book challenging Trump's golf record resurfaced. Caddies and club members have also shared stories about Trump's alleged cheating on the golf course.

title: Trade push: India in talks with US, EU; to resume negotiations with Canada
content: India is actively pursuing free trade agreements with key global players like the US and EU, alongside around 50 other nations and blocs. Commerce minister Piyush Goyal highlighted the strategic importance of "trusted partners" amid rising global trade risks. Discussions are progressing with the GCC, New Zealand, and Israel, while talks with Canada are set to resume.

title: 'Blood on your hands': TMC slams EC over SIR; submits list of 40 who allegedly lost lives
content: A Trinamool Congress delegation met the Chief Election Commissioner, presenting a list of 40 deaths, including 17 BLOs, allegedly linked to the ongoing special intensive revision exercise. The party accused the EC of having "blood on your hands" over the fatalities.

title: Chief selector Agarkar: A constant on overseas tours; an absentee from domestic cricket
content: Australia, Dubai, England, Dubai, and again Australia. In the last 12 months, Ajit Agarkar has been a constant figure on India's overseas tours. He even had fellow selector SS Das on two tours. Except the same appearance consistency hasn't been followed for Ranji Trophy matches. The former India cricketer had been accused of not watching enough local games even during his time as Mumbai selector and was forced to resign from the position

title: Stock markets at lifetime highs: What should investors do? Six mistakes to avoid
content: As markets rally, investors face six behavioural traps that can derail wealth. Overconfidence, panic selling after gains, FOMO-driven entries, succumbing to tips, ignoring diversification, and using borrowed money are highlighted. Prudent investors maintain discipline, stick to strategy, and avoid impulsive decisions to safeguard their long-term financial future.

title: Putin-Modi meet: Russian president to visit India on December 4; what's on agenda?
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin is scheduled to visit India on December 4-5 for a summit with Prime Minister Narendra Modi. Discussions are expected to focus on India's potential procurement of additional S-400 air-defense squadrons and Sukhoi-57 fighter jets. The ongoing Russia-Ukraine war will also be a key agenda item, with India reiterating its support for an early peaceful resolution.

title: Enterprising marine engineer projects A.P. as ‚Äòshipbuilding and logistics hub‚Äô
content: Mohanraju Muppala, who hails from Tirupati district, submitted a report to government proposing creation of a Special Economic Zone (SEZ) dedicated to international trade, warehousing and logistics

title: Key concerns over delays in cybercrime response raised at bank coordination meeting
content: Banks across Cyberabad commissionerate have been asked to establish a dedicated Cyber-Crime Response Desk to deal with requests related to freeze/defreeze actions, statements, and KYC within a strict turnaround time of 1‚Äì3 days.

title: LDF manifesto for Thrissur Corporation unveils vision for green city
content: With emphasis on environmental harmony and heritage protection, the manifesto positions the next phase of governance as one that can turn Thrissur into a nationally recognised model city

title: Sivankutty writes to Union Labour Minister demanding withdrawal of labour codes
content: Minister conveys State government‚Äôs concern that several provisions in the labour codes have overlooked crucial aspects of labour rights, workers‚Äô welfare, and the foundational values of social justice in India

title: Naidu seeks five-year Central support, says Amaravati and  Andhra Pradesh back on growth path
content: The Chief Minister pitches for capital gains tax relief to farmers, highlights progress on Polavaram, capital city works and renewed investor confidence including Google‚Äôs major commitment

title: NEERI study finds high levels of faecal contamination in Thevara-Perandoor, Edappally canals
content: The study was initiated after the National Green Tribunal directed the government to take steps to check the indiscriminate degradation of canals caused by illegal discharge of untreated wastewater into them

title: Mamkootathil‚Äôs arrest being delayed to help him destroy proof: Surendran
content: Former BJP State president says influential people are involved in helping Mamkootathil go into hiding

title: Man held for raping minor in Madhya Pradesh after six-day manhunt; shot while trying to flee custody
content: Arrest follows district-wide protests, highway blockade and transfer of senior officers in Raisen rape case

title: Kerala‚Äôs population projected to rise till 2041, then dip
content: IIMAD, PFI report says life expectancy in the State is projected to go up from 75.1 years in 2026 to 82.9 years by 2051. Also, by the middle of this century, Kerala will have the lowest share of children, at 12.8%

title: Kerala Minister's "Trojan Horse" Jab At Senior Congress Leader KC Venugopal
content: Kerala CPI(M) leader and state minister V Sivankutty on Friday launched a scathing attack against AICC general secretary K C Venugopal, calling him a "Trojan horse" deployed by the BJP to destroy the Congress.

title: Trinamool Leader Shot Dead In West Bengal, Aide Critically Injured
content: A Trinamool gram panchayat member was shot dead and his associate critically injured after unidentified assailants opened fire at them in West Bengal's Howrah late on Thursday night, police said

title: JD Vance Jokes Turkey Not As Tasty As Chicken, Troops Laugh Out Loud
content: US Vice President JD Vance on Thursday quipped that turkey meat didn't taste as good as chicken, leaving military troops belly-laughing as he talked about Thanksgiving dinner.

title: Teen Stabbed To Death In Delhi's Rohini, 3 Juveniles Detained: Cops
content: A 16-year-old boy was allegedly stabbed to death following a quarrel in northwest Delhi's Karala area, police said on Friday. The police have detained three juveniles in connection with the murder and launched further investigation.

title: First Part Of India-US Trade Deal To Be Done By 2025 End: Commerce Secretary
content: India is hopeful of signing the first tranche of the India-US Bilateral Trade Agreement within the current calendar year, Commerce Secretary Rajesh Agarwal said on Friday.

title: "Don't Want Anything": DK Shivakumar Amid Karnataka Leadership Row
content: Amid a stir over the Congress leadership in Karnataka, Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar on Friday reiterated that he does not want to rush into things and that the party high command will take a decision on the CM post.

title: Imran Khan's Sister Files Contempt Plea Against Adiala Jail Superintendent
content: Imran Khan's sister Aleema Khan has filed a contempt of court petition against the Adiala jail superintendent and others over their failure to follow an Islamabad High Court (IHC) order that directed a twice-a-week meeting.

title: "Not In Touch With Him": Trinamool Congress On MLA's 'Babri Masjid' Plan
content: A major controversy erupted in poll-bound West Bengal after TMC MLA Humayun Kabir announced he would lay the foundation stone of a mosque modelled on Babri Masjid in Murshidabad district on December 6.

title: "Central Leadership Responsible": Congress' Veerappa Moily On Karnataka Row
content: Senior Congress leader and former Union Minister M Veerappa Moily has cautioned that the party's central leadership is "responsible" for the ongoing 'power tussle' between Chief Minister Siddaramaiah and his deputy DK Shivakumar.

title: "She Sacrificed Power": DK Shivakumar's Sonia Gandhi Note In Karnataka Row
content: The Siddaramaiah-DK Shivakumar tug-of-war over the Karnataka Chief Minister's post  a headache the Congress could do without after another year of electoral defeats  flared up again Friday, with DKS' unsubtle reference to Sonia Gandhi.

title: Anti-Corruption Agency Arrests 8 Over Hong Kong Fire That Killed 128
content: Hong Kong's anti-corruption agency said on Friday it arrested eight people connected to the renovation of the high-rise apartments that were engulfed in a massive fire that left 128 people dead.

title: 'Will Sit Till Midnight For The Poorest Litigant': Chief Justice Surya Kant
content: Chief Justice of India Surya Kant on Friday said that ensuring justice for poor litigants is his top priority and he can sit till midnight in the court for them.

title: Saving Rivers, Planting Trees: PM Modi Calls Upon People To Take 9 Oaths
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday asked people to take nine oaths for 'New India', which aims to become a developed nation.

title: Bombay High Court Forms Joint Probe Panel As Mumbai Air Quality Worsens
content: Amid Mumbai's deteriorating air quality, the Bombay High Court on Friday ordered the formation of a five-member inspection team to examine construction sites across Mumbai for compliance with pollution-control norms..

title: DJ Refuses To Play Late Night Music At UP Wedding, Guests Shoot His Father
content: A disagreement over stopping DJ music at a wedding procession in UP's Hardoi took a deadly turn on Thursday, leaving one man shot dead and the venue deserted.

title: Court Bars Carmichael Mine Activist From Pursuing Adani's Confidential Data
content: The Supreme Court of Queensland has issued permanent orders preventing an anti-fossil-fuel activist from seeking or using confidential information belonging to Adani's Carmichael coal mines in Australia.

title: UP Man Stuck In Leopard Cage. He Allegedly Entered To Take Goat Kept As Bait
content: The strange incident took place in Umri Dahalo village, adjacent to the Katarniaghat Wildlife Sanctuary in the Bahraich district.

title: 'Operation Eagle Force': How Police Busted Nationwide Nigerian Drug Cartel
content: A major Nigerian drug cartel, operating an intricate nationwide supply and money laundering network, has been successfully dismantled following a massive, meticulously planned joint operation involving multiple Indian law enforcement agencies.

title: 'Bengal Neglected, Didn't Respect Bankim Chattopadhyay': Great Grandson
content: The upcoming winter session of parliament is likely to see a political googly with the Centre keen to hold a discussion on Vande Mataram, the national song penned by Bengal icon Bankim Chandra Chattopadhyay as the nation marked its 150th anniversary.

title: Video: The Bait Was For A Leopard. But It Attracted A Drunk UP Man First
content: Forest officials in Uttar Pradesh were surprised when a large metal cage intended to catch a leopard ended up trapping a local man instead. The video of the incident, which took place on Thursday night in the Bahraich district, has gone viral.

title: India seeks to strengthen multilateral engagement with International Fleet Review in Visakhapatnam
content: Naval diplomacy remains a vital component of India‚Äôs strategic toolkit and maritime domain has become central to India‚Äôs foreign policy and strategic outreach

title: Ensure ‚Çπ10 lakh compensation reaches families of deceased workers: Safai Karmachari Commission Chief
content: He has instructed officials to construct restrooms and toilets at all mustering points, clear all pending salary payments

title: Jyotirao Phule remembered on 135th death anniversary
content: Speakers recall him as a revolutionary thinker who fought British policies that imposed taxes on the poor while denying them access to education

title: One-year-old girl killed by leopard in Gujarat's Amreli; seven cages set up to trap animal
content: The incident took place around 6 p.m. on Thursday (November 27, 2025) in Trambakpur village, a statement from Dalkhaniya Range of the State Forest Department said

title: Kerala Governor to review functioning of university hostels, citing rising student unrest
content: The issue will be taken up during his interaction with 14 Vice-Chancellors at a programme scheduled at Calicut University on December 2.

title: As India & China face-off over Arunachal, what‚Äôs the larger geopolitical game?  | World View
content: India and China exchange sharp¬†words over Arunachal Pradesh after an Indian woman was detained at Shanghai airport.

title: Regulatory, patent barriers may hinder global access to new HIV prevention drug: activists
content: Lenacapavir, developed by U.S.-based Gilead Sciences, provides virtually 100% protection against HIV; activists slam Gilead‚Äôs patent filings, urge Indian regulators to waive requirement for local clinical trials

title: Cyclone Ditwah: Red alert for Tamil Nadu‚Äôs coastal districts on November 29 as storm moves closer
content: Red weather alert, indicating possibility of rainfall above 21 cm at one or two places, has been issued to four districts ‚Äî Cuddalore, Mayiladuthurai, Villupuram and Chengalpattu, along with Puducherry on Saturday

title: From Congress stronghold to swing seat: Edappally set for another fierce battle
content: Sitting councillor Deepa Varma is seeking another term and is being discussed as a possible mayoral candidate; debutant Abdul Latheef remains confident of reclaiming the seat for the UDF; and BJP‚Äôs C. Nandakumar says rival fronts are downplaying his party‚Äôs role out of concern over its growing influence

title: State govt. urged to set up a high-level inquiry into elephant deaths
content: Initiate legal action against officials if they are found to be guilty of negligence or of dereliction of duty, says wildlife conservationist

title: Elected representatives demand strict action to stop illegal sale of liquor, drug trafficking in Shivamogga
content: Former Home Minister Araga Jnanendra remarked that the sale of ganja cannot go on without the knowledge of local policemen

title: Chetti Pallakku, a symbol of communal harmony in Nagore Dargah‚Äôs anduri festival
content: A 24-year-old disc jockey and event manager in Nagapattinam takes time off every year to keep an age-old tradition alive and stay close to his roots

title: Coordination between leaders, officials key to national growth: Cabinet Secretary
content: T.V. Somanathan highlights governance coordination, Viksit Bharat vision and ease of doing business at Gujarat Chintan Shibir

title: KTU launches group personal accident insurance scheme for students
content: Under the scheme, students and their families will be eligible for financial assistance of up to ‚Çπ13 lakh depending on the nature of the accident.

title: Trinamool leader shot dead in Howrah, aide critically injured
content: According to police, two motorcycle-borne assailants approached them and fired several rounds at close range; a case of murder has been registered

title: Since inception, Safe Connect feature on KSP app helps 150 people in distress
content: Joint Commissioner of Police (Adminstration) Kuldeep Kumar Jain says that the Safe Connect feature has gained significant traction, with 2.3 million active users across the city

title: Most children suffer mental stress due to social media addiction, says KSCPCR chief
content: Shashidhar Kosambe visits Parvathi Nagar Central Prison, the Backward Classes Girls Hostel in Ballari to take stock of the situation

title: Cyclone Ditwah in Sri Lanka: PM Modi announces assistance under 'Operation Sagar Bandhu'
content: The first tranche of relief materials was handed over after the consignments were transported by the Indian Navy‚Äôs aircraft carrier INS Vikrant and the frontline ship INS Udaigiri

title: Congress asks if PM Modi will raise South Africa‚Äôs G20 exclusion with ‚Äògood friend‚Äô Trump
content: Party calls U.S. move an insult to Africa and Global South and urges India to defend sovereign equality at G20

title: Nirmala Sitharaman lays stone for 15 banks, insurance offices in Amaravati
content: Foundation laying for so many¬†financial institutions on a single day¬†at one place¬†is not just an act, but it is a¬†statement¬†to understand the future of the¬†capital city¬†of Andhra Pradesh and such a set-up is happening for the first time in the country, says the Union Finance Minister

title: India, Russia Defence Ministers to meet in Delhi on December 4; S-500 acquisition on agenda
content: Russia‚Äôs next-generation S-500 system can intercept ballistic missiles at ranges up to 600 km and airborne targets up to 400 km; Ministers will also discuss ship building, jointly developed weapons systems.

title: Vegetable prices see a sharp rise in Yadgir
content: Shortage in supply from local growers has been attributed to be the main reason for the sharp hike in the prices of vegetables

title: Withdraw draft amendment allowing women in hazardous industrial work, CPI(M) urges T.N. government
content: The party also criticises the government for issuing the draft notification without any consultation with trade unions

title: Bombay High Court quashes rejection of peon‚Äôs appointment under Nomadic Tribe quota, calls it illegal
content: Bombay High Court quashes Sindhudurg Education Officer‚Äôs 2018 order, ruling that government norms introduced after a 2011 appointment cannot be applied retrospectively and directing approval within four weeks

title: Supreme Court gives nod to Maharashtra local body elections
content: Supreme Court allows long stalled civic elections amid OBC reservation dispute and 50% quota ceiling concerns

title: Maharashtra declares paid holiday on December 2 for voting in civic council, nagar panchayat polls
content: The holiday directive will apply to all workers, employees and officers who are voters in the polling areas, irrespective of whether their workplace is located within or outside the constituency

title: The Playbook: Shadow Reports, lineup locks
content: the playbook for week 13 kicks off Thursday with three Thanksgiving day games . this column features score projections, over/unders, win probabilities, and easy digestible fantasy advice for seasonlong leagues and DFS . the weekly Shadow Reports: WR vs. CB Cheat Sheet .

title: Three bets on overreactions and mismatches of college football's Rivalry Week
content: this is a card of overreaction and straight mismatches . "Georgia is better than Pitt" is just lazy box score fluff with no premise . the Bulldogs are 121st in pressure with only 16 sacks, one of the most important indicators .

title: Malcolm Jenkins on Eagles HOF, Jalen Hurts and team scrutiny
content: former safety Malcolm Jenkins will be inducted into the Eagles Hall of Fame . he was the undisputed leader of the first Eagles team to hoist the Lombardi Trophy . his experiences as the front man in Philadelphia allow him a unique perspective into the post quarterback .

title: NFL Week 13's fashionable arrivals, featuring Joe Burrow
content: week 13 of the season kicks off on Thanksgiving and rolls right into a rare Friday game . the week is set to feel like a football runway from the jump . some stadiums called for full cold-weather gear, others just a light fall layer, and players dressed for every forecast .

title: NHL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, reasons for hope for each team
content: ESPN's panel of reporters, analysts and broadcasters continues to believe the Colorado Avalanche are the top team in the league in the weekly Power Rankings vote . there were some major swings this week, with the Tampa Bay Lightning , Minnesota Wild and Los Angeles Kings making a jump . but this is a time for thanks and positive vibes .

title: Where is the best landing spot for Kiffin?
content: a resolution is expected for each school in the running for Lane Kiffin . he has an opportunity to carve his face on the Mount Rushmore of Ole Miss legends if he stays . the team are looking to cement a CFP spot next season .

title: Cowboys remain hot, will play 'anybody, anywhere'
content: the cowboys have won three straight games for the first time since 2023 . they have inched over .500 for first time this season . in five days, the Cowboys beat the two participants in super bowl LIX .

title: Texas def. South Carolina on Harmon's late shot
content: Jordan Lee scores 19 points and Rori Harmon makes a 10-foot floater with a second left . the longhorns beat no. 2 south Carolina 66-64 in the women's title game of the Players Era Championship .

title: Throwbacks from Pats, Commanders, Seahawks top NFL Week 13 looks
content: the combination includes a plain silver helmet, navy jersey and white pant look . the Baltimore Ravens wore their classic threads against the Cincinnati Bengals . it's a busy week for alternates as part of the league's John Madden Thanksgiving .

title: MLB offseason grades: AL champs land an ace as Blue Jays sign Cease
content: the 2025-26 offseason is officially here, and we have you covered with grades and analysis for every major signing and trade this winter . if you're a big-money free agent signing that changes the course of your team's future, we'll weigh in with what it all means for next season and beyond .
